DOC.brief_title: Treatment Intrabony Periodontal Defects With Enamel Matrix Derivatives Autogenous Bone Graft
DOC.detailed_description: The present study aim evaluate effect enamel matrix derivative ( EMD ) either alone combine autogenous bone graft ( ABG ) apply intrabony defect chronic periodontitis patient clinical/radiographic parameter gingival crevicular fluid ( GCF ) transform growth factor-β1 ( TGF-β1 ) level , compare open flap debridement ( OFD ) . A total 30 deep intrabony defect 12 patient randomly treat EMD+ABG ( Combination group ) , EMD alone ( EMD group ) OFD ( Control group ) . Clinical parameter include plaque index , gingival index , bleed probing , probe depth , relative attachment level recession record baseline 6 month post-surgery . Intrabony defect fill percentage calculate standardized radiograph . TGF-β1 level evaluate GCF surgery 7 , 14 , 30 , 90 , 180 day surgery use ELISA .
